job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: currently we are having openings for facebook as a data scientist v only for w ltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtjob title data scientist vltbrgtduration monthsltbrgtclient facebookltbrgtreq id ltbrgtlocation hacker way menlo park ca ltbrgtltbrgtjob descriptionltbrgtltbrgt the marketing team focuses on building facebooks brand presence by improving user sentiment and product education ltbrgt our marketing team seeks to understand how our users feel about our products so we can help people better understand facebooks intent and mission and guide our users to key features that can enrich their lives ltbrgt the decision science team provides insightful analytics on consumer perception of the facebook experience as a consultative partner to our marketing team so we can better connect our users to facebook and our products we are seeking a talented analytics professional who thrives at the intersection of data human behavior marketing product and engineering ltbrgt the ideal candidate will have a strong technical and analytical background as well as an intense hunger to make a significant business impact by owning and driving business outcomes strong time management and communication skills are criticalltbrgtltbrgtresponsibilitiesltbrgtltbrgt partner with our marketing teams to make wellinformed decisions backed by product usage data and survey resultsltbrgt empathize with facebook users attitudes emotions and opinions to promote product awareness and meaningful interactions on the platformltbrgt partner with marketing research and product organizations to scope design execute measure and improve the impact of our marketing efforts on the world and on our businessltbrgt translate data insights into actions and recommendations that will drive brand sentiment user growth and engagement and marketing effectivenessltbrgt develop quantitative analysis tools ad hoc reports and models to support marketing decision making analysis areas might include but not limited to retention sentiment lifetime value messaging promotions usage and engagementltbrgt produce data visualization such as charts infographic and dashboards to communicate findings and actionable recommendations to internal stakeholders clearly and effectivelyltbrgtltbrgtminimum qualificationsltbrgtltbrgt a degree in economics operations research mathematics statistics engineering psychology or another field with quantitative roots and demandsltbrgt years of experience in data analysis data science decision science or similar quantitative fields applying experimentation methods to test various hypotheses for customer segmentation consumer sentiment or perception and outbound online marketing campaign evaluationltbrgt experience finding cleaning and manipulating data to build data setsltbrgt statistical modeling and data analysis experience eg significance testing regression modeling sampling theory etcltbrgt experience using r or python or a similar scripting language for statistical modelingltbrgt experience with sql hive presto hadoop or other data querying languagesltbrgt experience communicating with crossfunctional stakeholders including brand strategists marketing researchers product marketing managers and engineersltbrgtltbrgtpreferred qualificationsltbrgtltbrgt an mba or masters or doctorate degree in economics operational research mathematics statistics engineering psychology or another field with strong quantitative roots and demandsltbrgt experience working on political campaigns andor large brand campaignsltbrgt management consulting experience or a similar career requiring one to present datadriven insights to business audiencesltbrgt experience developing data pipelinesltbrgt experience using opensource statistical packages such as dplyr rstudio numpy pandasltbrgt basic experience or basic understanding of machine learning data mining and natural language processingltbrgt
